answers.answer: Hi,How are you? What other symptoms are present and what diagnostic tests were done? Pain, numbness or burning feeling suggests neurological issues that needs to be evaluated further. It can be also associated with underlying medical conditions such as diabetes, neuropathies, vascular as well as musuloskeletal issues. If it persists, it is best that you have this checked by your doctor for proper evaluation. Direct clinical evaluation including neurological examination and diagnostic tests such as nerve conduction test and imaging studies will help determine the underlying cause. Take care and do keep us posted.

question: Ihave pain on my left shoulder, down my arm in the armpit and side. My leg have a burning feeling and my foot feel numb.  Aiso my hand feel tingling with a sharp pain.
title: What is causes this pain?
